entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 late in the morning. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
